summary: I BEEN HAVING ISSUES WITH MY SEATBEALT RESTRAINT AND MY NEWBORN DRIVING IN HER SEATBELT. SEVERAL TIMES I HAVE COMPLAINED ABOUT HER CAR SEAT NOT BEING HELD FIRMLY AND FLIPS WHEN I TURN. THE COMPANY IS YET TO REMEDY THE SITUATION. AS A MOTHER IS IS VERY UNCOMFORTABLE FOR ME AND THEY HAVE NOT FIND A SOLUTION. I DO NOT BELIEVE MY INVESTMENT IN THIS CAR WAS WORTH MY NOW LACK OF SAFETY FOR ME AND MY CHILD. THIS SITUATION HAPPENS WHILE MY CAR IS IN MOTION AND SHE BEGINS TO SCREAM.
